summary: Project includes a wallpaper feature; background wallpaper option has been requested for removal.

existing_features.title: Remove the user-facing "Background wallpaper" control from the app header so users no longer see an option to choose/apply/remove a background wallpaper.

Disable applying and rendering a custom wallpaper background across the app layout, including clearing any previously persisted wallpaper in localStorage so older wallpapers do not continue to appear.
Clean up unused wallpaper-related frontend code and styles after the feature is removed (components, hooks, and CSS) to avoid dead code and unused Tailwind/CSS selectors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the Background wallpaper option from the wallpaper feature.

projectName: Remove Background wallpaper option and disable wallpaper feature
